column4: hi, How can I upgrade to oneiric? I am using gnome-shell ppa and says I cant upgrade...
what is the output of apt-get when you try to upgrade?
are you actually trying to dist-upgrade?
why wouldn't there be? e.g. uninstall the ppa packages at worst and then dist-upgrade
you have no oneiric sources in your sources.list
if I uninstall al X stuff, and remove gnome-shell ppa, will I be able to upgrade correctly, won't I?
you do not want to uninstall "all X stuff"
its gnome shell, so If I uninstall all gnome shell things, all will work, won't it?
for such a special upgrade I strongly suggest to use apt-get instead of update center, but your choice
how can I know which packages do depend on a ppa
you can do it with aptitude but I dunno how anymore, I'd have to look
